::: {#19b68167 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np

n=int(input("Enter n"))
mat=np.zeros((n,n+1))
roots=np.zeros(n+1)

def forwardElimination(mat):
    for j in range(n):
        row = input("Enter the first row of coefficients")
        row_arr=row.split(" ")
        for l in range(n):
            mat[j,l]=row_arr[l]
        mat[j,n]=row_arr[n]

    j=0
    while j<n :
        for k in range(j+1,n) :
            mat[k]=mat[k] - (mat[k,j]/mat[j,j])*mat[j]
        j+=1
forwardElimination(mat)

def backSubstitution(mat) : 
    global roots
    roots[n-1]=mat[n-1,n]/mat[n-1][n-1]
    p=n-2
    while p>-1:
        roots[p] = (mat[p,n] - sum((np.multiply(mat[p],roots))))/(mat[p,p])
        p-=1

backSubstitution(mat)
print("RRF :",mat)
print("Zeros are :",roots[0:n])
```
:::

``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np

n=int(input("Enter n"))
mat=np.zeros((n,n+1))
roots=np.zeros(n+1)

def forwardElimination(mat):
    for j in range(n):
        row = input("Enter the first row of coefficients")
        row_arr=row.split(" ")
        for l in range(n):
            mat[j,l]=row_arr[l]
        mat[j,n]=row_arr[n]

    j=0
    while j<n :
        for k in range(j+1,n) :
            mat[k]=mat[k] - (mat[k,j]/mat[j,j])*mat[j]
        j+=1
forwardElimination(mat)

def backSubstitution(mat) : 
    global roots
    roots[n-1]=mat[n-1,n]/mat[n-1][n-1]
    p=n-2
    while p>-1:
        roots[p] = (mat[p,n] - sum((np.multiply(mat[p],roots))))/(mat[p,p])
        p-=1

backSubstitution(mat)
print("RRF :",mat)
print("Zeros are :",roots[0:n])
```
